a bot or website or something that gives the status of <#CDJMS683D> and sets etiquette. for example, if it's been less than 30 seconds since the latest message, <#CDJMS683D> is in speedcounting mode and the expectation is that you don't hop in and you let the speedcounters count. then you can set up notifications for when speedcounting is done so that you can hop in
